cast.name: 约翰·M·杰克逊 John M. Jackson
雅德丽·史密斯 Yeardley Smith

writer.name: 吉娜·温德科斯 Gina Wendkos

director.name: 拉法尔·杰林斯基 Rafal Zielinski

introduction: Jesse is nine months pregnant and lives with her underemployed husband Hank in a dilapidated mobile home in a rusty trailer park. During an afternoon of talk, Jesse discovers that Hank has been spending time with Bonnie, their young, bovine neighbor. Jesse is hurt and furious, and Hank is defensive, claiming that the baby has pushed him out. While Hank is elsewhere, the other woman pays a surprise visit to Jesse. Healing begins, and when Jesse's labor starts, it's Bonnie who comes to the rescue.
